title: Yume Tsukai
synopsis: When people dream, they express their utmost desires and emotions within the confines of their mind; but when their strong emotions cross the border into reality, the dream can turn into an uncontrollable nightmare.
staff: [['Yamazaki, Kazuo', ['Director']], ['Tanaka, Kazuya', ['Sound Director']], ['Masuhara, Mitsuyuki', ['Episode Director']], ['Fudeyasu, Kazuyuki', ['Script']]]
